info.title: Muhimbi PDF
info.description: Convert, Merge, Watermark, Secure and OCR files.

post.description: Add a complex watermark to a PDF file.
Convert a file to PDF or other format.
Convert URLs or HTML to PDF.
Copy metadata and set content type.
Add an ellipse watermark to a PDF file.
Add an image based watermark to a PDF file.
Add a line watermark to a PDF file.
Add a Linear Barcode watermark to a PDF file.
Merge multiple files into a single PDF.
Convert a file to an OCRed PDF.
Extract text from a file using OCR.
Add a PDF based watermark to a PDF file.
Add a QR Code watermark to a PDF file.
Add a rectangle watermark to a PDF file.
Add a rich-text watermark to a PDF file.
Secure document. Apply security and encryption settings to PDF and Office documents.
Split a PDF file into multiple PDFs.
Add a plain-text watermark to a PDF file.

source_file_name.description: Name of the source file including extension

use_async_pattern.description: Use async behaviour for API request

source_file_content.description: Content of the file to watermark

watermark_data.description: Watermark data in Muhimbi XML format

use_async_pattern.description: Use async behaviour for API request

source_file_name.description: Name of the source file including extension

source_file_content.description: Content of the file to convert

override_settings.description: Optional settings using Muhimbi's XML syntax

template_file_content.description: Optional template file content (e.g. infopath XSN file)

use_async_pattern.description: Use async behaviour for API request

source_url_or_html.description: HTML fragment or URL to convert

viewport_size.description: Optional width and height of the simulated browser (e.g. 1024x768)

username.description: User name to log in to the SharePoint site

password.description: Password to log in to the SharePoint site

copy_fields.description: Optional comma separated list of fields

content_type.description: Optional content type for the destination file

source_file_name.description: Name of the source file including extension

use_async_pattern.description: Use async behaviour for API request

source_file_content.description: Content of the file to watermark

width.description: Width of the watermark (in Pts, 1/72 of an inch)

height.description: Height of the watermark (in Pts, 1/72 of an inch)

x.description: X Coordinate of the watermark (in Pts, 1/72 of an inch)

y.description: Y Coordinate of the watermark (in Pts, 1/72 of an inch)

opacity.description: Opacity in % (100 is fully visible and 1 is barely visible)

line_width.description: Width of the line (in Pts, 1/72 of an inch)

start_page.description: Number of the first page the watermark applies to

end_page.description: Number of the last page the watermark applies to

page_interval.description: Which pages to display the watermark on (1=every page, 2=every other, etc)

page_orientation.description: Orientation of pages the watermark applies to.

print_only.description: Tells if the watermark is only visible when the document is printed

start_section.description: The first section in a Word or Excel document the watermark is visible

end_section.description: The last section in a Word or Excel document the watermark is visible

page_type.description: One or more page types for Word and Excel documents, eg. default|first|even
